languages.text: "{name}". {n}Маражай медленно подходит к столу и облокачивается о него обеими руками.{/n} "Я размышлял о том, что когда-то пообещал тебе. По поводу удовлетворения твоего любопытства".
"{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Маражай медленно подходит к столу и облокачивается о него обеими руками.{/n} "Я размышлял о том, что когда-то пообещал тебе. По поводу удовлетворения твоего любопытства".

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

"{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋走到你的书桌前，双臂撑在桌面上。{/n}“我一直在思考之前答应过你的事情，关于满足你好奇心的事情。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋走到你的书桌前，双臂撑在桌面上。{/n}“我一直在思考之前答应过你的事情，关于满足你好奇心的事情。”

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは机の方へと大股に歩み寄ると、両腕を机の上に乗せる。{/n}「前に約束したことをずっと考えていた。お前の好奇心を満たしてやるってことについてだ」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイは机の方へと大股に歩み寄ると、両腕を机の上に乗せる。{/n}「前に約束したことをずっと考えていた。お前の好奇心を満たしてやるってことについてだ」

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai se acerca a tu mesa y apoya los brazos contra ella.{/n} «He estado pensando en lo que te prometí: que saciaría tu curiosidad».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai se acerca a tu mesa y apoya los brazos contra ella.{/n} «He estado pensando en lo que te prometí: que saciaría tu curiosidad».

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}La démarche féline, Marazhai s'approche du bureau avant de s'appuyer dessus des deux bras.{/n} « J'ai bien réfléchi à ce que je vous ai promis, quand je me suis engagé à assouvir votre curiosité. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}La démarche féline, Marazhai s'approche du bureau avant de s'appuyer dessus des deux bras.{/n} « J'ai bien réfléchi à ce que je vous ai promis, quand je me suis engagé à assouvir votre curiosité. »

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai pirscht zum Schreibtisch und stützt seine Arme darauf ab.{/n} "Ich habe darüber nachgedacht, was ich Euch zuvor versprochen hatte. Was Eure Neugier betrifft."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai pirscht zum Schreibtisch und stützt seine Arme darauf ab.{/n} "Ich habe darüber nachgedacht, was ich Euch zuvor versprochen hatte. Was Eure Neugier betrifft."

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai, etrafını kolaçan ettiği masaya kollarını yaslıyor.{/n} "Sana daha önce verdiğim sözü düşünüp duruyorum. Merakını giderme konusundaki sözü..."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai prowls over to the desk and braces his arms against it.{/n} "I have been thinking about what I promised you before. About satisfying your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai, etrafını kolaçan ettiği masaya kollarını yaslıyor.{/n} "Sana daha önce verdiğim sözü düşünüp duruyorum. Merakını giderme hakkında olan..."
